About the Company: Universal Auto Foundry Ltd. is engaged manufacturing iron castings. It offers castings components in grey iron and spheroidal graphite cast iron for three wheelers, passenger cars, commercial vehicles, earthmovers, tractors, construction and mining, compressors, pumps and valves and general engineering. It also offers suspension brackets, differential housing, hubs, brake drum, flywheels, adjuster nuts, pulleys, dampers. It caters its services to the engineering industry. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Jaipur, Rajasthan.
